skills.name: THRUST
desc: • 3 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• Disable Passive of enemy for 1 turn.
• Deals Additional True Damage for each damage over time effect on the enemy.

skills.name: FEVER
desc: • Deals 3 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• 40% Chance to Heal Block the enemy for 2 turns.

skills.name: BLOCK
desc: Takes the damage for any ally below 50% HP or any attack that would reduce an ally below 50% HP.
